trans-unit.target: TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_SEQ_02<tab>-1
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_1<tab>(-???-)...Oi! Y'all right, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_2<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)You were moanin' in your sleep an' sweatin' buckets besides. Rollin' of the ship got your stomach churnin', has it?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_3<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Hmmm... Don't seem like seasickness, now that I look at you. It'll be the aether, then, I reckon.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_4<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Some are more sensitive to the stuff than others, see, an' we ain't too far from Vylbrand now, which is chock-full of aetherytes.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_5<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)No need to fret, though. You'll soon get used to it.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_6<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Eurgh. Might as well have been bloomin' seasickness... Ship's leapin' around like a demented chocobo today.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_7<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)I reckon I might head out on deck─get meself a breath of fresh air.

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_8<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Limsa Lominsa's still a fair way off, in case you were wonderin'. Seein' as you're awake an' all, how's about you keep me company till we get there?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_9<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Them young'uns don't much care for conversation, see.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_10<tab>Anyroad, Brennan's the name, an' peddlin's me trade.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_11<tab>Ah, smell that salty sea breeze!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_12<tab>Now then, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, judgin' by your unusual garments, I'd say you were one of them new adventurers. Am I warm?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_13<tab>I knew it! Goin' wherever the wind blows, seekin' fortune an' glory─now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> what I call livin'!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_14<tab>So long as you can avoid dyin', I mean. Ain't no secret that adventurin's a risky business─these days especially.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_15<tab>What was it that first attracted you to it?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_Q1_000_1<tab>Why did you become an adventurer?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_A1_000_1<tab>To gain power.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_A1_000_2<tab>To win glory.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_A1_000_3<tab>To amass a fortune.

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_16<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>Power<var 1A 01 /var>? As in, er...power to do good? Like protectin' the weak, an' fightin' for what's right, an' all that? Aye, I thought that's what you meant. Well, adventurers do get up to a lot of fightin', that's for sure. You'll never be short of a chance to polish your warcraft in the adventurin' business.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_17<tab>Once we make port, you'd best sign yourself up at the Adventurers' Guild─they'll set you on the right path.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_18<tab>An' it wouldn't hurt to join a guild, neither.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_19<tab>Limsa's home to a few, so if you fancy learnin' how to swing an axe, or even sling a spell, you should think about seekin' one out.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_20<tab>Glory, eh? Well, if you're willin' to take on them tasks as other folk ain't, an adventurer such as yourself can win fame what coin can't buy.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_21<tab>When you arrive in town, you'll want to report to the Adventurers' Guild.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_22<tab>You can find out everythin' you need to know about the adventurin' business in there.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_23<tab>Fortune, eh? Well, it's a dream we've all had at one time or another.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_25<tab>Once you've learned to handle yourself in a fight, you'll want to pay a visit to whichever craftin' or gatherin' guild tickles your fancy.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_26<tab>Limsa Lominsa's renowned for its smitties an' armorers, not to mention its fisherfolk. An' then there's its cooks, of course.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_27<tab>Adventurin' ain't just about killin' things, after all. A peaceful pastime may well help you make your fortune!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_28<tab>Well, if you ain't inclined to tell, I ain't about to pry. Might be as ol' Brennan's a chatterbox, but he sure as hells ain't no busybody.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_29<tab>We all have a secret or three, don't we? Me? <var 1A 02 /var>Dozens<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_30<tab>An' I'd rather they stayed secret, too─which is why I don't go stickin' me nose where it ain't welcome.

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_31<tab>Just remember, though: there're more important things than fortune an' glory. Such as <var 1A 02 /var>breathin'<var 1A 01 /var>. Ain't no profit in bein' dead, an' that's a fact.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_32<tab>Uwaaah!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_SHIPMAN_000_33<tab>Ships off the starboard bow! Pirate colors!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_34<tab>Pirates? Bloody hells...
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_SHIPMAN_000_35<tab>Have ye no sense!? Get below!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_36<tab>What is the world comin' to...? Pirates firin' on a ship flyin' Lominsan colors! Bastards either have a boatload of balls, or bugger all for brains.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_SHIPMAN_000_37<tab>Ye can rest easy, friends! We've made it out o' cannon range, an' no buccaneer's bark'll catch this flighty temptress once the wind's in her sails.

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_37<tab>That was too bleedin' close... Glad one of us kept <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> head on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> shoulders─I reckon I'd've lost mine, otherwise.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_38<tab>If them pirates gave up the chase, we must be close to port. Let's head up on deck an' have us a look, shall we?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_39<tab>By the by, is this your first trip to Limsa Lominsa?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_Q2_000_1<tab>Is this your first trip to Limsa Lominsa?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_A2_000_1<tab>Yes.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_A2_000_2<tab>No.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_40<tab>It is!? Well then, let this journeyed itinerant tell you the ins an' outs of your destination. Ahem!

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_41<tab>Thought not! Ah, but I'll wager there've been some changes since your last visit. Allow a journeyed itinerant to apprise you of the current state of affairs. Ahem!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_42<tab>Limsa Lominsa prides itself on bein' Eorzea's foremost naval power.

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_43<tab>Weren't too long ago that the place was ruled by pirates, but thanks to the current Admiral's civilizin' influence, the city<var 1F /var>state could almost pass for a respectable nation. You'd never guess she was once a rum-swillin' buccaneer herself! Heh heh!

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_44<tab>'Course, most folk ain't so quick to change, an' with a town full of liberty-lovin' ruffians, you can imagine how many naysayers an' troublemakers she's got to deal with─like them pirates who took a fancy to us just now.

TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_45<tab>An' if that weren't bad enough, I've heard the Sahagin are raidin' the coast just as bold as you please. Them're the sea-dwellin' beastmen the locals call “fishbacks,” 'case you didn't know.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_46<tab>Ah, at long last. Land ho!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_47<tab>Behold Limsa Lominsa, a nation blessed by the ocean's bounty an' beloved of Llymlaen, goddess of navigation.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300010_NARRATION<tab>On a windswept isle in the southwestern corner of the realm,
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300020_NARRATION<tab>amidst the roiling waves of the Rhotano Sea, lies the maritime city<var 1F /var>state of Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300030_NARRATION<tab>To this haven for bandits and brigands, cutthroats and curs, seekers of both freedom and fortune, comes a lone adventurer.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300040_NARRATION<tab>Lone, yet not alone, for the hero's arrival has drawn the gaze of the nation's patron deity Llymlaen.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300050_NARRATION<tab>What realm-shaking fate has She descried in the churning waters of this mortal's future?
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_50<tab>An' here's where we part ways, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_51<tab>I'm off to the markets to deliver me wares, then it's on to the highroad for me.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_52<tab>Here, I want you to have this─by way of thanks for savin' me arse earlier.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_53<tab>Hey─you never did tell me your name, did you? Well, here's an idea...
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_BRENNAN_000_54<tab>Become the sort of storied personage I can brag about havin' met, an' I'll consider us square.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300060_NARRATION<tab>Through peril and hardship, discovery and triumph, may the Navigator guide this brave soul on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> life's voyage...
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_300070_NARRATION<tab>Till sea swallows all.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_RYSSFLOH_000_60<tab>(-Yellowjacket Infantryman-)Hey! You there!
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_RYSSFLOH_000_61<tab>(-Yellowjacket Infantryman-)Aye, I mean you. This is my district, and I make it my business to know all the scum that washes up in it.
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_RYSSFLOH_000_62<tab>(-Yellowjacket Infantryman-)Ah, an adventurer fresh off the boat, is it? Well then...
TEXT_MANSEA000_00541_RYSSFLOH_000_63<tab>Allow one of Limsa Lominsa's finest to set you on the right path. Hop to it, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, I haven't got all day!
